          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Seeing things: light reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sehen von von Sachen: helle Reflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voir des choses : réflexion légère</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vendo coisas: reflexão clara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vedere le cose: riflessione chiara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να δει τα πράγματα: ελαφριά 
αντανάκλαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ver cosas: reflexión ligera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that we can see other people because of light reflection. To see our own reflection, we use a mirror.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß wir die Leute wegen 
der hellen Reflexion sehen können. Um unsere eigene Reflexion 
zu sehen, benutzen wir einen Spiegel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que nous pouvons voir 
d'autres en raison de la réflexion légère. Pour voir notre 
propre réflexion, nous utilisons un miroir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que nós podemos ver os 
povos por causa da reflexão clara. Para ver nossa própria 
reflexão, nós usamos um espelho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che possiamo vedere 
la gente a causa della riflessione chiara. Per vedere la nostra 
propria riflessione, utilizziamo uno specchio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι μπορούμε να 
δούμε άλλους ανθρώπους λόγω της ελαφριάς αντανάκλασης.
Για να δούμε την αντανάκλασή μας, χρησιμοποιούμε 
έναν καθρέφτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que podemos ver a la 
gente debido a la reflexión ligera. Para ver nuestra propia 
reflexión, utilizamos un espejo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anblick</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
